text: "The Other Guy" is a 1983 song by Australian band Little River Band and is taken from their 1982 album Greatest Hits. It went to number 2 in New Zealand, number 11 in the United States, number 18 in Australia and number 30 in Canada. ==Track listings== ; Australian 7" (Capitol Records – CP-918) :A. "The Other Guy" - 2:53 :B. "Take It Easy on Me" (Live) - 3:45 ; New Zealand 7" (Capitol Records – F 5185) :A. "The Other Guy" - 2:49 :B. "No More Tears" - 3:27 ; North America 7" (Capitol Records – B-5185) :A. "The Other Guy" - 2:49 :B. "No More Tears" - 3:27 Category:1983 songs Category:Little River Band songs
title: The Other Guy (song)
